LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.MegaMenu.Admin.ClickToConfigure
LocaleResource.Value: To configure the plugin either click HERE or go to Plugins -> Nop Mega Menu -> Settings

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.MegaMenu.Admin.Settings.CategoriesColumnTitle.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Set the tilte of the column that contains the categories.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.MegaMenu.Admin.Settings.CategoriesImageSize.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Set the image size of the categories pictures (in pixels). If set to 0 the ThumbnailImageSize property, from nopCommerce, will be used.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.MegaMenu.Admin.Settings.EnableCategories.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If enabled a categories menu item will be included to the Mega Menu.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.MegaMenu.Admin.Settings.EnableClickForDropdown.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If checked the Mega Menu dropdowns will show on click (not on hover as default).

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.MegaMenu.Admin.Settings.Enabled.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If checked the Mega Menu plugin will be enabled.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.MegaMenu.Admin.Settings.EnableManufacturers.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If enabled a manufacturers menu item will be included to the Mega Menu.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.MegaMenu.Admin.Settings.EnableVendors.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If enabled a vendors menu item will be included to the Mega Menu.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.MegaMenu.Admin.Settings.IncludeRecentlyAddedLink.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If enabled - "New products" link will be included to the Mega Menu.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.MegaMenu.Admin.Settings.IncludeBlogLink.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If enabled a "Blog" link will be included to the Mega Menu.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.MegaMenu.Admin.Settings.IncludeNewsLink.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If enabled a "News" link will be included to the Mega Menu.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.MegaMenu.Admin.Settings.IncludeForumLink.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If enabled a "Forum" link will be included to the Mega Menu. Please make sure that your forum is enabled from Configuration -> Settings -> Forum Settings.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.MegaMenu.Admin.Settings.IncludeHomePageLink.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If enabled a "Home Page" link will be included to the Mega Menu.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.MegaMenu.Admin.Settings.IncludeMyAccountLink.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If enabled a "My Account" link will be included to the Mega Menu.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.MegaMenu.Admin.Settings.IncludeContactUsLink.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If enabled a "Contact Us" link will be included to the Mega Menu.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.MegaMenu.Admin.Settings.StickyCategoryId.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Sets the category that will be always shown as an item in the top level of the menu.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.MegaMenu.Admin.Settings.ManufacturerImageSize.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Set the image size for the manufacturers in pixels. If set to 0 the ThumbnailImageSize property, from nopCommerce, will be used.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.MegaMenu.Admin.Settings.ManufacturersColumnTitle.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Set the tilte of the column that contains the manufacturers.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.MegaMenu.Admin.Settings.ManufacturersItemName.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Set the tilte of the manufacturers menu.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.MegaMenu.Admin.Settings.ManufacturerTitleInManufacturerItem
LocaleResource.Value: Manufacturers title in the manufacturers menu

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.MegaMenu.Admin.Settings.ManufacturerTitleInManufacturerItem.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Set the tilte of the column that contains the manufacturers in the manufacturers menu item.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.MegaMenu.Admin.Settings.MegaMenuCategoryTemplate.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Choose a template for the categories in the MegaMenu. This template defines how the categories and their subcategories will be displayed.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.MegaMenu.Admin.Settings.MegaMenuManufacturerTemplate.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Choose a template for the manufacturers in the MegaMenu. This template defines how the manufacturers will be displayed.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.MegaMenu.Admin.Settings.MenuItemName.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Set the title of the categories menu.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.MegaMenu.Admin.Settings.NumberOfCategories
LocaleResource.Value: Maximum number of categories in category item

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.MegaMenu.Admin.Settings.NumberOfCategories.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Set the maximum number of categories/subcategories that are going to be shown in a singte category item. If the maximum number is exeeded a "View all categories" link will be shown.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.MegaMenu.Admin.Settings.NumberOfManufacturers.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Set the maximum number of manufacturers that are going to be shown in a manufacturer menu item. If the maximum number is exeeded a "View all manufacturers" link will be shown.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.MegaMenu.Admin.Settings.NumberOfManufacturersInCategories
LocaleResource.Value: Maximum number of manufacturers in category item

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.MegaMenu.Admin.Settings.NumberOfManufacturersInCategories.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Set the maximum number of manufacturers that are going to be shown in a singte category item. If the maximum number is exeeded a "View all manufacturers" link will be shown.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.MegaMenu.Admin.Settings.NumberOfVendors.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Set the maximum number of vendors that are going to be shown in the vendors menu item. If the maximum number is exeeded a "View all vendors" link will be shown.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.MegaMenu.Admin.Settings.ProductsImageSize.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Set the image size of the Featured products and Best Seller Products by category, that are populated in the Model. You can use them in the CategoryMenuTemplate views. If set to 0 the ThumbnailImageSize property, from nopCommerce, will be used.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.MegaMenu.Admin.Settings.ShowCategoriesInASingleMenuItem
LocaleResource.Value: Show categories in a single menu

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.MegaMenu.Admin.Settings.ShowCategoriesInASingleMenuItem.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If checked the categories will be shown in a single menu. Otherwise each top level category will be shown in a separate menu.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.MegaMenu.Admin.Settings.ShowManufacturersInCategories.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If checked the category manufacturers, will be shown.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.MegaMenu.Admin.Settings.VendorsColumnName.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Set the tilte of the column that contains the vendors.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.MegaMenu.Admin.Settings.ShowTopicsBodyInDropdown.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: If checked each topic showed as a menu item will have a drop-down with its body as a content.
